item.title: Deloitte goes all in on AI — despite having to issue a hefty refund for use of AI
item.description: Deloitte is rolling out Claude to its nearly 500,000 employees after issuing a refund for a report that contained AI hallucinations.

item.title: Lucid Motors sets record as Gravity sales pick up and tax credit expires
item.description: The company has seen EV deliveries increase for seven straight quarters, even though it's still way off the ambitious goals it promoted when it went p...

item.title: Taylor Swift fans accuse singer of using AI in her Google scavenger hunt videos
item.description: Swifties love a puzzle, but some were rubbed the wrong way by a promotional scavenger hunt which appeared to use AI-generated videos.

item.title: Microsoft buys another 100 MW of solar, this time in Japan
item.description: The new deal covers output from four different solar projects. Microsoft has said it will spend $2.9 billion to expand its infrastructure in Japan.

item.title: OpenAI ramps up developer push with more powerful models in its API
